Title: Oppose economism! Destroy the new counter-offensive of the capitalist class reactionary line
Designer: Revolutionary Rebel Command of the Shanghai Publishing System (上海出版系统革命司令部)Revolutionary Rebel Committee of the Shanghai People's Fine Arts Publishing House (上海人民美术出版社革命造反委员会)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: 'Economism' is one of the tendencies combatted in the early phase of the Cultural Revolution. 'Economism' simply means that economical factors have priority over political and ideological factors, an idea opposed by Mao and his supporters.Text on the armband: 造反队 (Rebel team, Zaofan dui).Text on the paper the man is tearing: 经济主义 福利主义 (Economism Welfarism - Jingji zhuyi Fuli zhuyi).
